page.title: 15Clubs & Events
page.content: Most social and educational activities in this community centre around the {Church & Women's Institute movement. The Church recently held a{Spring {Festival}lasting 2 weeks. A concert of music & song, choral evenings, old time night & and a supper dance were included. Regular{coffee days}are oraganised at homes of individual villagers. Stalls including cakes, bring & buy & "White Elephant" are organised and a{raffle}held. Funds raised are either for upkeep of the Church, village hall or charity. Local schools hold annual{jumble sales}& {Christmas concerts}open to all. Aby W.I. which has been in existance{65 years holds monthly meetings & a yearly flower show where villagers submit entries of flower arrangments, vegetables & homemade produce. Prizes are awarded.
